revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #36 Chocco |image = [[File:Occa.png]] |caption = On dit de cette Baie qu'elle poussait autrefois en grand nombre sous les tropiques. Elle est vraiment très épicée. |growtime = 6h 6m 0s |harvest = 21 baies |replant = 5% |mutation = 0,01% |points = 1 200 |flavor =
*15 épicée *0 sèche *20 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }} '''Chocco''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle vide avec au moins 1 [[Razz/fr|Framby]], au moins 1 [[Tamato/fr|Tamato]] et au moins 1 [[Spelon/fr|Kiwan]]. Des [[Farming Setups/fr|Configurations de Ferme]] utilisant la Chocco sont listées [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|ici]]. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Mûr |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 2 heures 14 mins 50 secs || 3 heures 40 mins || 4 heures 26 mins 40 secs || 6 heures 6 mins - 12 heures 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:OccaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:OccaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:OccaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Parasite (Tendance à remplacer les plants voisins) | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 6 hours 6 mins -
12 hours 12 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 4 hours 4 mins -
8 hours 8 mins || 49 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 42 mins 40 secs -
5 hours 25 mins 20 secs || 33 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Occa_Flow_Chart.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === '''WARNING:''' Trying to mutate Occa while having the Blaze Cassette equipped will result in your Spelon turning into Chople.
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Occa berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]] [[Tamato]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]] [[Figy]] |- | [[File:Spelon.png|30px]] [[Spelon]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Razz.png|30px]] [[Razz]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]] [[Tamato]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]] [[Figy]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]] [[Tamato]] |- | [[File:Spelon.png|30px]] [[Spelon]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Razz.png|30px]] [[Razz]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Spelon.png|30px]] [[Spelon]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || |- | [[File:Figy.png|30px]] [[Figy]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Tamato.png|30px]] [[Tamato]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]] [[Figy]] |- | [[File:Razz.png|30px]] [[Razz]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Spelon.png|30px]] [[Spelon]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Razz.png|30px]] [[Razz]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Spelon]] || - || - || - |- | [[Tamato]] || 2 hours 24 mins until ripe || 1 hour 36 mins until ripe || 1 hour 4 mins until ripe |- | [[Figy]] || 5 mins 50 secs until ripe || 3 mins 53 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Razz]] || 4 mins 10 secs until ripe || 2 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not Practical |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Occa berries can be used to mutate the following berries.

[[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]]
[[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] |- | [[File:Petaya.png|20px]] [[Petaya]] || [[File:Passho.png|20px]] [[Passho]] [[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]]
[[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] [[File:Yache.png|20px]] [[Yache]]
[[File:Chople.png|20px]] [[Chople]] [[File:Kebia.png|20px]] [[Kebia]]
[[File:Shuca.png|20px]] [[Shuca]] [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]]
[[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]] [[File:Tanga.png|20px]] [[Tanga]]
[[File:Charti.png|20px]] [[Charti]] [[File:Kasib.png|20px]] [[Kasib]]

[[File:Roseli.png|20px]] [[Roseli]] |- |}
